title-group.article-title: UNE SYNTHESE SUR LA PLANIFICATION DU CREDIT AGRICOLE TUNISIEN. APPROCHE DES VOIES D'AMELIORATION / SOME PROPOSALS TO AMELIORATE FARM CREDIT PLANNING IN TUNISIA: A SYNTHESIS

abstract.p: The synthesis develops along the classical lines of planning schemes: situation analysis, goals formulation, ways and means evaluation, project execution and control. Attention is focused on the problems of how to decentralise collection and how to analyse data, credit intervention and control, and, on the other hand, on the need for co-ordinating structures within each planning phase and among different institutions (financial institutions, Ministry of Agriculture agencies, other institutions) at local, regional and central levels. The need to integrate farm credit policies with general economic plans, and particularly with those meant for the agricultural sector is moreover emphasized, to be implemented both when sketching the project and when checking the results, which are thus evaluated in financial as well as in real terms.
